message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd love. I'm offering it to you for $95. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to $90.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $87.50?
I'm still a bit far from my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $85.50
